description.oldValue: Microsoft Endpoint DLP provides customers the ability to create and enforce DLP policies that regulate the sharing of sensitive data to Bluetooth devices using the same DLP policy creation and management solution they currently use to support DLP across Microsoft's fully unified DLP offering with the experience their users are already familiar with.
description.newValue: Microsoft Endpoint DLP provides customers the ability to create and enforce DLP policies that regulate the shaof sensitive data to Bluetooth devices using the same DLP policy creation and management solution they currently use to support DLP across Microsoft's fully unified DLP offering with the experience their users are already familiar with. Apologies for the delay.  Now rolling out this month.
